results.title: car decal, live laugh love decal, load aim fire, car stickers, bumper stickers, decals, stickers, decals for cars
results.description:
Live, Laugh, Love. This decal is about 6x6 If you need a different size for a specific type of application please contact us to request a custom order

Top quality 5-7 year outdoor vinyl decals that last and look great. Car stickers and decals that stick to many smooth surfaces. Fast shipping and excellent customer service.

Our decals are made of high quality, self-adhesive vinyl.

They can go on any CLEAN, smooth, dry, non-porous surface (wall, mirror, glass, plastic, metal, etc.). It is removable although not reusable.

If you have a problem with your order please message me before placing a bad review, i will be more than happy to help you.
Also if you would like a different color other than black or white please message me and we can work out a color.

Dimensions listed are height x width (in inches). These dimensions are the overall size of the decal from the highest point to the lowest point in the design.
Please keep in mind, if you'd like different size options we can get you any size you'd like. Just let us know under the ASK A QUESTION tab.

Install: Some decals WILL come in multiple pieces due to the size of the design. Decals are shipped masked and ready for application and can be placed on any flat, Non-porous, clean surface on interior items as well as exterior items. Carefully remove tape from backing sheet making sure the entire sticker comes with it. Press firmly in place and use a squeegee (credit card works too) to get all the air bubbles out. Peel off transfer tape making sure the entire sticker stays in place.

*IMAGES DISPLAYED ARE FOR REFERENCE ONLY AND MAY NOT REFLECT EXACT SIZE AND/OR COLOR.

*Your order will ship out within 1-3 business days and you will get a shipping notification email. We ship USPS First Class Mail.

*No additional shipping charges when ordering multiple decals

*Please contact us if you have any questions

Picture is for illustration only and may not represent the actual size. Please go by the listed dimensions. Most decals are measured W x H unless otherwise noted. If only one dimension is listed it is the longest side of the graphic.

New decals being added weekly to our ever growing collection of vinyl decal graphics.

Search all products by your interests and keywords.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Chalkboard Quote Art Print - 8x10
results.description:
HANDMADE IN THE USA
I create and package every piece of art myself to ensure the highest quality possible for every print I sell. That means all the magic happens right here in North Carolina, USA! 

THE FINEST MATERIALS 
All fine art prints are created with high-performance matte paper. Then a subtle and elegant linen texture is embossed onto the surface. The result adds just the right level of texture to your images without interfering with details. 
THE PERFECT (EASY!) GIFT 
Each of my art prints is packaged with care and an artistic eye, so that it can be delivered straight to a lucky recipient who will be super impressed by its crafty, handmade charm! This is high-quality packaging that will not only WOW you, but also protect your art from any possible damage or bending in transit :-D

SO MANY MORE TO CHOOSE FROM! 
This print is just one of many I offer! Check out the HUNDREDS of other prints and sets available by clicking the "Categories" tab in the menu at the top of this page, and browse my wide variety - there's something for everyone!

results.title: Live Love Laugh sign. Pallet wood signs. Rustic Home Decor. Wooden Live Love Laugh. Farmhouse decor. Christmas gift. Wedding gift.
results.description:
Rustic, hand painted, farmhouse, pallet wood Live Love Laugh Sign.
This is the perfect gift for weddings, anniversaries, birthdays, Christmas, and much more occasions, or just a great decoration for any room of your home.

This sign is made from reclaimed pallet wood and each piece of wood has it's own character - color, natural wood grain, knots, holes, scratches. The selection, cutting, distressing and painting of each piece of this sign is all done  by hand, what makes each sign unique and one of a kind.

The three pieces with dimensions  6" x 4" each are connected with twine or white leather rope for hanging.

Each sign is lightly coated with clear finish for protection and easy cleaning.

We would be happy to customize this sign with your choice of lettering (up to 8 letters per plaque), just leave us a message in the "note to seller" at checkout. If you need different size, please contact us for a quote.

For more of our designs please go to https://www.etsy.com/shop/AllVividArt?ref=search_shop_redirect or https://www.allvividart.com/

Thanks for visiting us!!!
AllVividArt

results.title: miracle wall decal -  Wall Quote Vinyl Decal Sticker wall lettering Faith Friends Couple Bedroom Living Family love Mother heart live laugh
results.description:
Miracle Quote Sign vinyl decal / sticker


You have several sizes and colors to choose from.

These decals are made out of a high quality vinyl that will last many many years. The decal can be removed whenever you would like and it does not damage the wall or paint. The decal is a cut-out, so this means the background will be whatever surface you put it on.  The decal in the picture is Matte Black.

This decal has many different applications. They can be used on your Front door, wall, kids room, bedroom, bathroom, game room, mirror, kitchen, window, man cave, or any smooth surface. The options really are endless.

The decals are easy to apply and will be shipped with detailed instruction in case you have any questions.

The "Matte" finish option does not have a gloss and does not reflect light making them perfect for some applications. Every color that is not matte will have a high gloss finish.


***If you do not see exactly what you are wanting, please contact me. I can make custom decals to fit your needs.***

results.title: Live well laugh often love much wood sign, rustic wooden sign, inspirational gift, encouragement wall hanging, gallery wall, live laugh love
results.description:
"Live well, laugh often, love much" script font wood sign now listed! (Also available in print font - message for details.) **Note: wreaths/vases/flowers/props not included. Listing is for designated sign only.**

Each sign is custom-designed, distressed, hand-painted, antiqued, and framed. Since each piece of the sign and frame are hand cut, crafted and distressed from quality wood, paint and/or stain, no two signs are ever the same, and no attempt is made to hide, fill or cover all imperfections or knots. In fact, imperfections add to the vintage, chippy one-of-a-kind character and are celebrated in all their glory! 

This sign as shown is antique white with black painted letters (no vinyl -- though the letters are painted with stencils and will appear a bit raised due to the multiple coats of paint that we use for coverage/color consistency/to eliminate bleeding), a walnut frame and is sealed with a clear, protective top coat. (Inside use recommended.) Please see last photo for other framing options. Please feel free to "convo" with me with any questions. 

This sign as depicted measures approximately 30" wide by 6" tall by 1 1/8", including the frame. A sawtooth hanger is also provided (though not attached) to each individual sign. 

Shipping time is currently as reflected in our shipping section above since your sign is handmade upon purchase. However, if expedited services are required, we are happy to work with you to the best of our ability. (Please see the "Policies" tab above.) 

Giving this as a gift? We will gladly work with you to mail your package directly to the recipient and include a note and gift wrapping free of charge. Local pickup is also available.

Visit us at www.etsy.com/shop/wahltowallwordlove to see more from our shop. Thank you for stopping by and we look forward to working with you!

*Our goal is for you to be 100% satisfied with your Wahl to Wall Word Love purchase. If for any reason you are not satisfied, we will do everything within our power to make it right. To that end, please help us by reading the item description and size carefully, contacting us with any questions, needs or concerns, and checking that all contact information and addresses are accurate prior to placing your order.



Do not copy. All designs and photos are the property of Wahl to Wall Word Love. All Rights Reserved.

results.title: Bracelet -Laugh Every Day, Love Beyond Words, Live Every Moment
results.description:
Bracelet -Laugh Every Day, Love Beyond Words, Live Every Momenta

The flat leather is stamp etched with the mantra "Laugh Every Day, Love Beyond Words, Live Every Moment"

We love this positive uplifing inspirational quote here at the EWE project.

We have crafted this bracelet in a flat 10mm wide PU leather in your colour choice of Dark Blue, Red or Grey. 

Then we teamed it up with a stainless steel snap clasp.  Now you choose your length and colour choice for the perfect bespoke handcrafted bracelet personal to you and your beliefs.

Simple but effective inspirational bracelet to show the world you care...

 

SIZING
To ensure you get the perfect fit for your styling...

1: Measure your wrist with a flexible tape, strip of paper or piece of string, where you would normally wear the bracelet. The tape should be firm around the wrist but not tight.

 2: If you are using a strip of paper or cord, mark your size with a pen or pencil then use a ruler to measure the length. That would be your exact wrist size.

 3: To find your bracelet size, just add your wrist size with the appropriate measurements below.

GUIDE, ADD cm(s) TO WRIST SIZE
For a Snug Fit Add 1.5cm
For a Comfort Fit. Add 1.5 to 2cm
For a Loose Fit Add 2 to 2.5 cm

For example, if you have a 17cm wrist and like a comfort fit, choose 18.5cm - 19cm bracelet size from the drop down list.

CARE FOR YOUR LEATHER BRACELET

We advise with all leather products to avoid bathing/showering in them and avoid wearing whilst  swimming or engaging in water based activities to preserve the leather.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Gift Mug, Inspirational Gift Idea, Motivational Coffee Mug
results.description:
Make your favorite hot drinks even more enjoyable with your new mug. Make this the perfect gift for yourself or for someone special.

🔰FEATURES AND SPECS.
~11oz or 15oz capacity coffee mug
~Image is printed on both sides of the mug or all around for some mugs
~Designs are printed and permanently sublimated on the mugs. 
~Designs will not peel or scratch off.

🔰COLOR AND PLACEMENT VARIATIONS
Physical items received may vary in color from the picture that appear on screen due to every monitor being calibrated differently. Therefore colors may be displayed different on computer/monitors, iPad screen and phone monitors from actual product. 

All items are made to order so placement might vary slightly on each item.

🔰PROCESSING TIME
Processing time is 1-3 business days not including shipping time. Allow an additional 2-3 business days for USPS priority shipping. If you need your items by a certain time please message me.

🔰CARE INSTRUCTIONS
All mugs are top shelf dishwasher safe and microwave safe.

The design will not wash off in the dishwasher but for longer lasting we recommend hand washing.

🔰ONLY THE BEST
All of my items are handmade and made to order and carefully packed with protective packaging. If there is an unlikely event of product damage during shipment please message me immediately and send me a picture of the damaged item and box within 48 hours of receiving the shipment. I will send a replacement as soon as possible.

💕Please note that all items are perfectly imperfect therefore they are one of a kind and not meant to be perfect💕

Thank you.

results.title: Live Simply Laugh Often Love Deeply, Inspirational Print, Home Decor, Live Laugh Love, Minimalist Print, Motivational Printable, Home Print
results.description:
Live Simply Laugh Often Love Deeply is a high quality instant downloadable print. You can use it to decor your house in an easy and affordable way!

INSTANT DOWNLOAD

Please note that this is a digital product and no physical product will be shipped. Frame is not the included.

With this instant download you will save time and shipping fees. You can easily print it using your home printer or print it to your local or online print shop.

DIGITAL FILES

You will receive 5 high resolution files (300 dpi - required printing standard), which you can print in these sizes:

* 4 x 6 JPG print
* 5 x 7 JPG print
* 8 x 10 JPG print
* 11 x 14 JPG print
* A4 size JPG print

STEPS AFTER PURCHASE

When your order is confirmed you will receive a download link in your email confirmation. The printables will also be available in your account, under Purchases and Reviews.

Due to the nature of the product, I don't accept refunds or returns.

Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or if you require additional information. I am happy to help!
